R

resetRobotLocation() - Method in class com.thoughtworks.robot.BaseRobot
 
resetRobotLocation(Robot) - Static method in class com.thoughtworks.robot.demo.DemoRobot
 
resetRobotLocation() - Method in class com.thoughtworks.robot.Robot
A method which must be implemented by all other Robot classes (BaseRobot) to tell how to reset the state Location of Robot.
RightMove - Class in com.thoughtworks.robot.moves
This class represents a RIGHT ("R") Move on Plateau.
RightMove() - Constructor for class com.thoughtworks.robot.moves.RightMove
 
Robot - Class in com.thoughtworks.robot
A Robot which represents an actual robot instance which can planted on Plateau.
Robot(String, MoveParser, LocationParser, Plateau) - Constructor for class com.thoughtworks.robot.Robot
Public constructor which creates a Robot instance.
RobotOverlapException - Exception in com.thoughtworks.robot.exception
A Plateau can allow/disallow two Robot to share same coordinate and this can be controlled by an instance variable allowRobotOverlap in Plateau.This exception will be used to notify an exception situation when a Robot will try to occupy a coordinate which is already occupied by another Robot on same Plateau and Plateau does not allow sharing of same coordinates by two Robots.
RobotOverlapException(String) - Constructor for exception com.thoughtworks.robot.exception.RobotOverlapException
 
robots - Static variable in class com.thoughtworks.robot.demo.DemoRobot
